title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Skills: Three-Stage Instructional Design for Science Domain Learning Autonomy

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level foundational scientific knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: By the end of Week 2, learners can apply self-directed exploration strategies in scientific problem-solving with 80% accuracy or higher.
By the end of the course, learners achieve 70% or higher in independent learning performance capabilities at Form 3 level.
Learners can revise and improve their learning plans two or more times through peer feedback and self-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
